Rulings.Edison:
●Everliving Underworld Cannon's effect is a Trigger Effect.
●Everliving Underworld Cannon's effect always activates the first time a Zombie-Type monster is Special Summoned onto your side of the field during each turn.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Everliving Underworld Cannon" is a Trigger Effect.\n2. The effect of "Everliving Underworld Cannon" always activates the first time a Zombie-Type monster is Special Summoned onto your side of the field during each turn.
